li.div: Falcon Nation- Please support our students by driving by our athletic complexes in Aplington and Parkersburg, this Friday from 8:00 to 8:25. #bethelightIA @iowahsada @aaronthomas @ap_falcons
A little message from the A-P Dance Team.

FALCON NATION-The @iowahsada has invited all schools to support our students in missing classes during the Covid-19 pandemic. To support the #bethelightIA movement, we will be turning our lights on every Friday night at 8:00pm.
The A-P High School Drama Department presents Fairy Tale Courtroom Friday, March 13th and Saturday, March 14th at 7pm in the High School Auditorium. Admission $5, activity passes accepted.

It's HERE!! I in just a few hours is our Drill Team Dance Showcase in the High School Gym. Its going to be a great show!!! Show time is 7:00 PM Get here early to get a great seat. Cost $5.00 per person (activity tickets will not be honored)
Its coming up fast!!! Its going to be a GREAT Show!! 2Days A-P Dance Spring Show Friday February 28th, 2020 @ 7:00PM

Join us tonight for our Coaches vs. Cancer game. We take on Grundy Center in a girls/boys doubleheader starting with the girls at 6:15. The Falcons are fundraising for the Butler County Relay for Life. Hope to see a big crowd!
Thank you to all who donated to the AP Honor Society Winter Drive. All donations were given to the Parkersburg Clothes Closet.

span.data-emptytext: Aplington-Parkersburg School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Students, parents, employees and others doing business with or performing services for the Aplington-Parkersburg Community School District are hereby notified that this school district does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, age (in employment practices), religion, national origin, creed, sex, marital status (in educational programs), socio-economic status, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, genetic information (in employment practices), and geographic location (in educational programs), in admission or access to, or treatment in, its programs and activities or its hiring and employment practices, in accordance with federal and state law.

p.span: Students, parents, employees and others doing business with or performing services for the Aplington-Parkersburg Community School District are hereby notified that this school district does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, age (in employment practices), religion, national origin, creed, sex, marital status (in educational programs), socio-economic status, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, genetic information (in employment practices), and geographic location (in educational programs), in admission or access to, or treatment in, its programs and activities or its hiring and employment practices, in accordance with federal and state law.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
